<rule id="springboot-jmx-to-quarkus-00000" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile matches="//*/c:bean/@class[windup:matches(self::node(), 'org.springframework.jmx.export.MBeanExporter')]">
                    <namespace prefix="c" uri="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="13" title="Spring JMX is not supported by Quarkus with GraalVM on a Native Image">
                    <message>
                        Spring JMX XML configuration detected:

                        Spring JMX is not supported by Quarkus with the GraalVM Native compilation.
                        Spring JMX can be used with the Quarkus Hotspot compilation however.
                    </message>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
